localize.title: Buzzing on The Economist
localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: “I find it comical. I really do.” Before @CindyMcCain was censured by her local Arizona Republican Party, @AnneMcElvoy asked her how she felt about the criticism from its members. “I'm very proud of what I did...I know I did the right thing” https://t.co/YPbmDa4N3E
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: "我觉得很滑稽。我真的觉得很滑稽。" 在@CindyMcCain被当地亚利桑那州共和党谴责之前，@AnneMcElvoy问她如何看待其成员的批评。"我为我的所作所为感到非常自豪......我知道我做了正确的事情 "https://t.co/YPbmDa4N3E。
"我覺得很滑稽。我真的覺得很滑稽。" 在@CindyMcCain被當地亞利桑那州共和黨譴責之前，@AnneMcElvoy問她如何看待其成員的批評。"我爲我的所作所爲感到非常自豪......我知道我做了正確的事情 "https://t.co/YPbmDa4N3E。

previous.title: “I wouldn't be surprised if solar ends up being 50% of the world’s electricity by 2050.” Analyst @solar_chase tells @Eaterofsun that the energy form is currently “the cheapest source of electricity in many countries.” https://t.co/JNKdF6JcHB

localize.full_text: "如果到2050年，太阳能最终占到世界电力的50%，我不会感到惊讶。" 分析师@solar_chase告诉@Eaterofsun，这种能源形式目前是 "许多国家最便宜的电力来源 "https://t.co/JNKdF6JcHB。
"如果到2050年，太陽能最終佔到世界電力的50%，我不會感到驚訝。" 分析師@solar_chase告訴@Eaterofsun，這種能源形式目前是 "許多國家最便宜的電力來源 "https://t.co/JNKdF6JcHB。

next.title: “Biden is ahead of pace of all his seven predecessors.” On “Checks and Balance”, @kdtenpas says the new president’s speed in staffing his administration will help him deal with the multiple crises he faces https://t.co/VRL1cjwWcp

localize.full_text: "拜登的步伐领先于他的所有七位前任。" 在 "检查与平衡 "节目中，@kdtenpas表示，新总统为政府配备人员的速度将有助于他应对面临的多重危机https://t.co/VRL1cjwWcp。
"拜登的步伐領先於他的所有七位前任。" 在 "檢查與平衡 "節目中，@kdtenpas表示，新總統爲政府配備人員的速度將有助於他應對面臨的多重危機https://t.co/VRL1cjwWcp。
